20101230161210.000|20101230161214.000|CC1|NEW YORK, OHIO AND ARIZONA.

20101230161217.000|20101230161220.000|CC1|EXAMINED THE SWABS FOR TOTAL

20101230161241.000|20101230161241.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 1:09:00 of 2:00:00
20101230161241.000|20101230161244.000|CC1|GERMS?                          
20101230161244.000|20101230161245.000|CC1|>> I'D SAY THE SUGAR.           
20101230161245.000|20101230161246.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YEP.               
20101230161246.000|20101230161248.000|CC1|SUGAR HAD THE LOWEST AVERAGE    
20101230161248.000|20101230161252.000|CC1|COUNT, WITH ONLY 2,300 BACTERIA.

20101230161257.000|20101230161258.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHEN WE ASKED      
20101230161258.000|20101230161259.000|CC1|PEOPLE TO GUESS WHICH ITEM WAS
